entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:12 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

Temperature: -26.1°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 75 %

Dewpoint: -29.2°C
Wind: N 4 km/h

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
